name: Retro TV Game Collection
description:
Retro TV Game Collection is exactly that, a package of four time-honored classics from the dawn of home video games.

FOUR GAME MODES!


Tennis
The one that started it all, known by many names, an instantly recognizable institution of gaming history.

Football
Licensed players and teams? of course not! better to see your friends fall to pieces as you score the last minute winner? Absolutely.

Squash (Practice Mode)
Tired of being humiliated by your friends or the CPU? Practice against nothing but the wall. Hone your reflexes and see how high you can score.

Squash
Put those practice sessions to the test, same wall, new opponent.

ALL NEW FEATURES!


It may have taken 50 years but all games now feature these much needed improvements.

Paddles no longer vanish off-screen!
CPU opponent and 1 player mode!
A score limit!
A pause button!
Controller Support!
Stats!
Assist Mode!
Steam Cloud Saves!
Achievements! **

FREE UPDATES!


All updates will be FREE, FOREVER!!!!
ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - This is something we really wanted to include at launch but it will be here soon we promise.
REALISTIC MODE - Sometimes quality of life updates are just not needed and only the original will do.
